structure.unit: SOVEREIGNTY AND JURISDICTION OF THE COMMONWEALTH

law.text: The fourth week of May of each year is designated as Retired Teachers' Week. The Governor may annually issue a proclamation designating the fourth week of May as Retired Teachers' Week and calling upon public schools and citizens of the state to observe the occasion and honor the retired teachers of the state.
law.history: Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 35, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1986.
